sub_title: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations
summary:
As a driven and experienced Senior Business Consultant and Innovation Consultant, I have successfully guided organizations towards growth and success through my expertise in knowledge management, customer success, system integrations, and sales enablement. With a Master's degree in Science and Innovation Management, I bring a solid academic foundation to my professional endeavors.

Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated my ability to drive innovation and deliver exceptional results. As a Senior Business Consultant, I have successfully led the design and implementation of advanced contact center software solutions and knowledge management platforms for a diverse range of clients. My strong analytical skills and strategic mindset have enabled me to identify opportunities for process improvements and optimize operations.

In my role as an Innovation Consultant, I have contributed to the development of cutting-edge solutions by leveraging emerging technologies and industry best practices. Through my deep understanding of innovation frameworks and methodologies, I have facilitated the creation of forward-thinking strategies and the execution of transformative initiatives. I have worked closely with cross-functional teams to foster a culture of innovation and drive organizational growth.

Moreover, my Master's degree in Science and Innovation Management has provided me with a strong foundation in understanding the complexities of managing innovation within organizations. I have acquired valuable insights into innovation processes, technology commercialization, and business model development, enabling me to provide strategic guidance and make informed decisions.

In addition to my academic and professional expertise, I possess a track record of successfully implementing knowledge management solutions, customer success programs, and seamless system integrations. I have collaborated closely with clients, stakeholders, and technical teams to ensure clear communication, alignment of objectives, and the delivery of exceptional results. By fostering strong relationships and exceeding client expectations, I have consistently achieved high levels of customer satisfaction.

My passion for innovation, coupled with my ability to analyze complex business challenges and deliver innovative solutions, sets me apart as a Senior Business Consultant and Innovation Consultant. I am dedicated to driving organizational growth, enhancing customer experiences, and enabling seamless system integrations through my expertise and strategic insights.

projects.title: AS Watson Health & Beauty Benelux (ASW)
projects.description:
AS Watson, the largest international health & beauty retailer in Asia and Europe, operates 13 retail brands across 25 markets, encompassing over 11,000 stores globally. With its flagship brand Watsons, AS Watson is Asia's largest health & beauty retailer, serving customers through more than 4,200 stores and 1,000 pharmacies worldwide. Operating in prominent Asian markets, such as China, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau, Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, the Philippines, Korea, and Indonesia, as well as Turkey and Ukraine in Europe, AS Watson holds a strong presence.

Within this dynamic organization, I served as a project manager and implementation consultant, leading the deployment of an advanced email solution. This involved establishing an external expert assistance process for various procurement departments, implementing monitoring and escalation workflows to ensure streamlined operations. Additionally, I successfully deployed a knowledge component, facilitating online access to internal agents and customers for Kruidvat and ICI Paris Xl. Furthermore, I developed a customized call portal for AS Watson, enabling efficient logging of phone interactions and providing valuable management information through classification capabilities. To support effective decision-making, I designed and implemented several analytics dashboards and custom reports for the management team.

My role in driving these technological advancements and process improvements showcased my ability to successfully deliver complex projects within a dynamic retail environment. I am proud to have contributed to AS Watson's ongoing success and growth by implementing innovative solutions that enhance operational efficiency and improve customer experience.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: Coolblue
projects.description:
Coolblue, one of the leading online retailers in the Netherlands and Belgium, is driven by a singular goal: to bring smiles to its customers. With a focus on the smallest details, Coolblue strives to exceed customer expectations. Offering approximately 400 different web shops and a number of physical stores, Coolblue provides a seamless shopping experience.

In my role as a project manager and design lead, I played a pivotal role in implementing a new customer interaction solution that transformed telephony and email management. This solution was enhanced by an intelligent knowledge base, enabling efficient and personalized customer support. To ensure a seamless experience, I oversaw various integrations, including CTI integration with the ContactMakers platform, ERP integration with a bespoke order system, and integration with the WFM platform Injixo. Furthermore, I successfully deployed Texas Digital, which presented real-time blended contact center data on dynamic wallboards and desktops.

Through my leadership and expertise, I facilitated the successful implementation of these innovative solutions, enhancing the overall customer experience at Coolblue. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies and integrating various systems, we achieved improved efficiency and optimized customer interactions.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: Department of Road Transport (RDW)
projects.description:
The RDW (Department of Road Transport) is the primary national authority overseeing the safety and environmental regulations of the motor vehicle fleet in the Netherlands. With responsibilities ranging from registering vehicle and owner data to issuing essential documents like vehicle registration certificates and driving licenses, the RDW plays a crucial role in ensuring compliance and facilitating information exchange with both domestic and foreign authorities.

As a project manager and implementation consultant, I have successfully led multiple projects at the RDW. These initiatives encompassed various areas, including customized knowledge base enhancements, development of tailored reports, seamless content migration, and providing comprehensive support and training for certification processes. Through my involvement, I helped optimize operational efficiency and streamline critical functions within the organization.

With a meticulous approach and a keen eye for detail, I ensured that the knowledge base was tailored to meet the specific needs of the RDW. By implementing customizations, I facilitated easy access to accurate information, empowering staff members and enhancing their productivity. Additionally, I played a vital role in designing and generating custom reports, enabling data-driven decision-making and improving organizational insights. 

My contributions to the RDW projects have been instrumental in enhancing operational effectiveness, promoting regulatory compliance, and driving organizational growth.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: International Card Services (ICS)
projects.description:
ICS (International Card Services) is the premier credit card specialist and the largest credit card provider in the Netherlands. With over 20 years of industry expertise, ICS excels in issuing, managing, and processing Visa and MasterCard transactions. Moreover, ICS facilitates numerous co-branded credit card programs, offering customers the same convenience as their other credit cards while providing exclusive deals and discounts through these collaborations. ICS has established joint venture agreements with esteemed partners such as ABN AMRO, Bijenkorf, ANWB, Heineken, and BMW.

As a dedicated professional, I contributed to an optimization study for email response management at ICS. Leveraging my expertise, I conducted a comprehensive audit to assess the existing system and processes. The findings led to valuable insights and recommendations, which were instrumental in implementing various configuration changes to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of email response management. Additionally, I provided essential support in developing and implementing internal procedures to streamline operations and improve overall customer service.

By actively engaging with stakeholders, analyzing complex requirements, and implementing practical solutions, I played a crucial role in driving operational excellence at ICS. The optimization study not only optimized email response management but also enhanced customer satisfaction by ensuring timely and accurate communication.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: Statistics Netherlands (CBS)
projects.description:
Statistics Netherlands (CBS) is a leading institution entrusted with the collection, processing, and publication of data that serves as a foundation for practical applications, policy-making, and scientific research. In addition to producing national statistics, CBS plays a vital role in generating European community statistics. The information disseminated by CBS covers a broad range of societal aspects, encompassing macro-economic indicators, consumer prices, and individual and household incomes.

During my tenure as a project manager and implementation consultant at CBS, I led a significant upgrade project that entailed redesigning the email response management system for both customer service departments. This involved redefining processes to cater to the specific needs and demands of our customer service operations. Concurrently, we undertook an automation project to streamline the handling of email deferment inquiries, simplifying and expediting response procedures.

Employing my expertise in project management and implementation, I collaborated closely with stakeholders to ensure the successful execution of these initiatives. By integrating cutting-edge technologies and optimizing workflows, we achieved improved efficiency and effectiveness in managing email communications. As a result, we elevated customer satisfaction levels and enhanced overall operational performance.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: vidaXl
projects.description:
vidaXL is an innovative trading company currently focusing on expanding its online sales presence. Since its inception in 2006, vidaXL has evolved from importing goods exclusively from China and selling them on eBay Germany to becoming a robust organization with approximately 200 employees. Today, vidaXL operates across several European countries, Australia, and through popular platforms such as eBay and Amazon, as well as its own web shops.

In my previous role as a project manager and implementation consultant, I played a pivotal role in the initial implementation phase at vidaXL. This phase involved the successful deployment of an integrated email and call-tracking solution, supported by a comprehensive internal multilingual knowledge base that leveraged case-based reasoning. To achieve seamless operations, I led the development of crucial integrations with various systems, including CTI integration with the MassXess telephony platform, email integration with eBay Message & Feedback, and customer and order information integration with eBay, Amazon, Magento, and Heidler. Additionally, I oversaw the rollout of the Webselfservice component across the different web shops, ensuring its availability in over eight different languages.

By effectively managing this implementation, I enabled vidaXL to enhance its customer support capabilities, streamline communication channels, and optimize its overall service delivery. These efforts contributed to improved customer satisfaction, increased operational efficiency, and ultimately, accelerated business growth.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: Oxford University Press (OUP)
projects.description:
Oxford University Press (OUP), a distinguished department of the University of Oxford, plays a pivotal role in advancing the university's mission of excellence in research, scholarship, and education through its global publishing endeavors. With an extensive reach, OUP publishes in over 40 languages and offers a diverse range of formats, both print and digital, ensuring their content caters to a wide academic and educational spectrum.

As a key contributor to OUP, I took charge of the design phase, addressing the challenge of disparate email solutions utilized across various departments. Through meticulous planning and collaboration, I successfully formulated a comprehensive deployment strategy. The outcome was an agreed-upon and well-documented deployment document, laying the foundation for a seamless initial go-live of four departments based in the United Kingdom. This accomplishment paved the way for further expansion and integration across additional departments in the future.

By leveraging my expertise as a project manager and implementation consultant, I effectively bridged the gap between diverse email systems, streamlining communication processes and enhancing efficiency within the organization. This initiative exemplifies my commitment to fostering cohesive and scalable solutions that align with organizational objectives.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

projects.title: SNS Reaal
projects.description:
SNS REAAL, a prominent player in the banking and insurance sector, offers comprehensive financial services through its seven distinctive brands. With a strong focus on the Dutch market, SNS REAAL caters to the diverse needs of individuals, small businesses, and medium-sized enterprises. Their offerings span savings, investment, mortgage, property finance, insurance, and pensions. As a testament to their market presence, SNS REAAL's shares are listed on the NYSE Euronext Amsterdam and are included in the esteemed Amsterdam Midkap Index.

During my tenure, I played a pivotal role in key initiatives at SNS REAAL. Firstly, I contributed significantly to the RFI/RFP process and Proof of Deployment phase for the Unified Desktop project at SNS Bank. This undertaking aimed to enhance operational efficiency and deliver a seamless customer experience through the consolidation of knowledge management, email management, and case management functionalities. Moreover, I spearheaded a design project for a cutting-edge contact center at Reaal Insurance. This project encompassed the integration of various components such as Customer View, Contact History, Sales Hints, Management Information, and Softphone to create a unified and streamlined communication platform.

contributors.headline: Senior Business Consultant | Driving Success through Knowledge Management, Omnichannel Contact Center Solutions, and AI-driven System Integrations

profile_positions.description:
As a Senior Business Consultant and shareholder, I have played a vital role in driving the success and growth of organizations through my expertise in knowledge- and innovation management. With a proven track record, I have been instrumental in supporting the development of Polly.help, a knowledge management platform, from its startup phase to its current scale-up stage.

Key Contributions:

Throughout the journey of Polly.help, I have been involved in every aspect, starting from the initial idea to the development of the platform. I have actively contributed ideas for product features and continuously gathered client- and partner feedback, translating it into actionable roadmap stories to enhance the platform's functionality and usability.

As part of the organization's growth, I have played a pivotal role in elevating Polly.help from a startup to a scale-up organization. I provided invaluable support in marketing efforts, ensuring the delivery of compelling web texts and customer success cases. Additionally, I conducted a thorough SWOT analysis, resulting in recommendations to increase the organization's competitiveness in the market.

With a focus on business expansion, I onboarded new sales- and implementation partners, equipping them with the necessary training to effectively promote and implement Polly.help. I collaborated closely with these partners, designing out-of-the-box integrations between Polly.help and their respective contact center platforms, facilitating smooth deployments and integrations.

With a strong focus on driving organizational growth, delivering exceptional customer experiences, and enabling seamless system integrations, I am dedicated to leveraging my expertise to drive the success of organizations utilizing Polly.help, enabling them to optimize their knowledge management and customer experience capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Consultant and Shareholder

profile_positions.description:
In my current position as a Manager Business Consultancy, I am entrusted with leading the design and implementation of advanced contact center software and knowledge management solutions for large enterprises. 

With a strong track record of success, I have effectively delivered and integrated software solutions for numerous prestigious clients, including Getronics (UK), Medavie Blue Cross (CA), Tadawul (SA), Camelot (UK), Central Bank (CA), HomeServe (UK), United Airlines (US), Florida Department of Children and Families (US), DVLA (UK), Mediq (NL), DVSA (UK), Telford & Wrekin Council (UK), Translink (NL), WWF (UK), Shelter Insurance (US), Cymphony (UK), and UKPN (UK), among others.

As a leader, I oversee a team of consultants, guiding them in designing and implementing tailored contact center software and knowledge management solutions. I provide effective project management oversight, encompassing strategic planning, resource allocation, risk mitigation, and performance tracking, to ensure successful project outcomes.

By fostering strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, and technical teams, I facilitate clear communication, alignment of objectives, and exceed client expectations. Moreover, I implement rigorous quality assurance processes, including testing, performance monitoring, and continuous improvement, to deliver reliable, scalable, and high-performing solutions.

Throughout my career, I have closely collaborated with renowned and international operating organizations such as Upstream Works, Content Guru, KPN, eGain, Cisco, Pegamento, NetDesign, DDM, EvolveIP, Natilik, TTEC, NWE, Cloudoe, and Capgemini. These collaborations have further strengthened my expertise in leveraging cutting-edge technologies and industry-leading solutions.

With a focus on driving innovation, exceeding client expectations, and delivering impactful results, I am dedicated to driving success and enabling organizations to enhance their contact center operations.
profile_positions.title: Manager Business Consultancy

profile_positions.description:
During this period, I thrived as a results-driven Business Consultant specializing in designing and implementing cutting-edge contact center software solutions for prominent organizations across various industries. Some of the esteemed organizations I collaborated with include Coolblue, Telefonica (ES), Arcadia (EN), SNS Reaal, VidaXl, Oxford University Press (EN), Danske Bank (DK), Centraal Bureau voor de Statisiek, International Card Services, Kärcher (DE), Telekom Austria Group (AU), and A.S. Watson.

My key accomplishments during this time include:

Conducting comprehensive requirements analysis: I engaged with key stakeholders to deeply understand their unique business needs and challenges. This enabled me to tailor innovative solutions that addressed their specific requirements effectively.

Orchestrating seamless integrations: I successfully integrated contact center solutions with diverse backend systems, such as CRM platforms, facilitating streamlined data exchange and optimizing customer interactions.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams: I fostered close collaboration with developers, system architects, and project managers, ensuring smooth implementation and delivery of complex projects. This collaborative approach played a pivotal role in achieving project success.

Implementing cutting-edge solutions: I utilized my expertise in deploying advanced contact center solutions, including eGain, Cisco ECE, Synthetix, and Texas Digital, to empower organizations with state-of-the-art technology and optimize their customer service capabilities.

These achievements reflect my ability to deliver high-impact results, collaborate effectively, and leverage innovative technologies to drive success in the contact center domain.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
During this period, I actively contributed to a consulting team focused on the Rotterdam CCS Network project case study at the DCMR Environmental Protection Agency Rijnmond. 

My responsibilities encompassed several key areas:

Literature Research: I conducted an extensive literature review to identify global best practices in CCS and sustainability initiatives. This research provided valuable insights into innovative approaches and successful implementations in similar contexts.

Stakeholder Interviews: I conducted interviews with key stakeholders, including government officials and industry leaders. These conversations allowed me to gain diverse perspectives and valuable input, contributing to a comprehensive understanding of the project's potential challenges and opportunities.

Innovation System Assessment: I also conducted an in-depth assessment of the innovation system surrounding the CCS industry in Rotterdam. This involved analyzing the ecosystem of actors, institutions, policies, and processes that support innovation and technological advancements in the field. This assessment provided valuable insights into the strengths and weaknesses of the innovation system and identified potential areas for improvement.

By actively engaging in these tasks, I contributed to the comprehensive evaluation of the Rotterdam CCS Network project while gaining valuable experience in project analysis and innovation system assessment.
profile_positions.title: Innovation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Throughout this period, I had the privilege of supporting Dr. S. Negro and Dr. R. Harmsen in their esteemed roles as instructors for the following courses:

• Introduction to Energy and Resources
• Innovation Systems

In this capacity, my primary responsibilities encompassed coordinating course logistics, evaluating assignments and exams, and providing guidance to students within workgroups. These tasks required meticulous attention to detail, effective communication, and the ability to foster an engaging learning environment.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

profile_positions.description: During this period, I held a part-time position as a kitchen assistant, where I dedicated my weekends and holidays to providing daily meals for the elderly. In this role, I focused on ensuring the nutritional needs and well-being of the elderly through the preparation and delivery of wholesome meals.
profile_positions.title: Kitchen Assistant

profile_positions.description:
During this period, I had the privilege of interning at the esteemed strategy division of Ecofys, where I actively contributed to my master's thesis titled:

"Assessing the Deployment Potentials of Offshore Wind and Deep Geothermal Technologies in the Netherlands: A Comprehensive Model for Renewable Energy Technology Deployment from 2010 to 2020."

During my internship, I immersed myself in extensive research and analysis to determine the potential for deploying offshore wind and deep geothermal technologies within the Netherlands. My thesis aimed to develop a comprehensive model that encompassed various factors influencing the deployment potentials of renewable energy technologies.

This experience allowed me to deepen my understanding of strategic considerations within the renewable energy sector while honing my research, analytical, and modeling skills.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description:
Throughout this period, I dedicated 12 hours per week as an assistant to Prof. Hekkert, contributing to the development of new courses within the bachelor curriculum. Specifically, I played a vital role in shaping the following courses:

• Innovation Systems
• Context of Energy Innovations
• Technologiebeoordeling in de Praktijk (Technology Assessment in Practice)

In this capacity, I meticulously curated relevant literature, crafted comprehensive concepts for assignments and exams, and ensured seamless coordination of these newly introduced courses. Additionally, I actively engaged with students by facilitating workgroups and providing valuable guidance and support.
profile_positions.title: Assistant to Prof. Hekkert

profile_positions.description: During this tenure, I excelled as a call center agent, specifically assigned to the esteemed Tele2 retention project. My consistent high scores reflected my exceptional performance in this role. Besides gaining valuable insights into the telecom sector in the Netherlands, I also honed my communication prowess and persuasive abilities.
profile_positions.title: Call Center Agent
